# Summary

* [*Alignment*](alignment.html); principle that AM objectives are

  [*demands*](demand.html)
  
* Purpose of the shorter [*AM policy*](ampolicy.html) and longer more-strategic

* [*Criticality*](criticality.html) allows for the prioritisation of different
  assets
